meanings.definition: Resembling a bristle in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The cactus had bristlelike spines for protection.
meanings.sent2: The brush had bristlelike bristles that were perfect for cleaning.
meanings.sent3: The porcupine wore a hat made of bristlelike feathers for a fancy party.
meanings.sent4: The wind created a bristlelike effect on the surface of the water.
meanings.sent5: Her hair had a bristlelike quality that made it stand out.
